about_the_game:
Project Fox Online (PFO) is a third-person multiplayer shooter built around team-based tactics, stealth and action.

Built as a spiritual successor to Metal Gear Online 2; PFO takes heavy influence from competitive games such as Counter-Strike in every core aspect of gameplay mechanics, level design and overall balance.

Competitive and Balanced Gameplay
Whether you’re a veteran or a new player, everyone starts on an even playing field, which means no items, equipment or perks advantages – no aspect of your character will improve as you play. Skill, game sense, map knowledge/control and tactics are what you will have to learn to become a PRO. Weapons will be balanced out between distance, power and accuracy ratios, creating an equal playing field despite the weapon of choice.

POWERED BY UNREAL
Unreal Engine is created by Epic Games, it is used to power the amazing graphics within Project Fox Online. Unreal Engine has a long history within the gaming industry and it provides world-class performance and visuals. It is truly a future proof engine that continues to evolve and grow to meet the demands of each generation.

name: Project Fox Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Project Fox Online is a third-person multiplayer shooter built around team-based tactics, stealth and action. Players improve their individual skills to rank up and compete in a variety of game modes within official tournaments for unique cosmetic gear and points.
